Text: These are some of the best dark fantasy novels ever written, better even than the Elric books.  I will seed this forever since they are long out of print.

As a teenager I stumbled across a Kane novel... it was yellowed and cost me 50 pence... and it was better than any book I ever read of the genre... thanks so much for seeding this as I haven't got the funds to buy these out of print books for over 100 quid!
